医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的切换协议提高了手术安全性一项新研究展示了一项成功的质量改进计划，可显着提高手术安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/New-handoff-protocol-boosts-surgical-safety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/New-handoff-protocol-boosts-surgical-safety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d84936a3-9c9e-473a-a921-e39b0bd26b37 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 14:12:49 -0400 New handoff protocol boosts surgical safety
揭示自身抗体在 COVID-19 严重程度中的作用尽管 COVID-19 对大多数人来说是一种轻微且短暂的疾病，但有些人的症状极其严重；在最坏的情况下，这些患者会因呼吸衰竭或血栓栓塞等并发症而死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Unveiling-the-role-of-auto-antibodies-in-COVID-19-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Unveiling-the-role-of-auto-antibodies-in-COVID-19-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=048c91fc-5f66-4503-96e1-e186c4ea5932 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 14:06:27 -0400 Unveiling the role of auto-antibodies in COVID-19 severity
FDA 批准一项临床试验，测试新型脑传感器阵列的有效性美国联邦药物管理局批准了一项临床试验，以测试由加州大学圣地亚哥分校的工程师开发的记录手术期间大脑活动的电子网格的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/FDA-approves-a-clinical-trial-to-test-the-effectness-of-new-brain-sensor-array.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/FDA-approves-a-clinical-tri-to-test-the-effectness-of-new-brain-sensor-array.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e04fe22-d908-4e3d-8730-61019c24d475 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 13:51:56 -0400 FDA approves a clinical trial to test the effectiveness of new brain sensor array
通过家庭安全干预措施改善中风幸存者的健康结果圣路易斯华盛顿大学医学院的研究人员发现，安全干预措施（例如助行器、扶手、坡道和其他房屋改造）可以让许多中风幸存者继续在家中独立生活，并可能降低死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Improving-中风-幸存者-健康-结果-通过-home-safety-interventions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Improving-中风-幸存者-健康-结果-through-home-safety-interventions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=100e7b33-2ea8-4033-b56e-f7bc665a7d6e Wed, 19 Jun 2024 13:30:29 -0400 Improving stroke survivor health outcomes through home safety interventions
联邦营养倡议可以为残疾父母提供婴儿喂养支持和咨询婴儿喂养，包括母乳喂养、配方奶喂养和固体食物的引入，对于养育子女至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Federal-nutrition-initiative-can-offer-infant-feeding-support-and-counseling-to-disabled-parents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Federal-nutrition-initiative-can-offer-infant-feeding-support-and-counseling-to-disabled-parents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f7f1edb-2d4e-42d1-9794-9490f09ea63e Wed, 19 Jun 2024 13:20:49 -0400 Federal nutrition initiative can offer infant feeding support and counseling to disabled parents
通过数字队列方法了解电子烟行为加州大学圣地亚哥分校的科学家利用社交媒体上现有的大量数据进行了一项新研究，引入了一种强大的新方法来了解国家的健康状况，即电子烟的流行情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Understanding-vaping-behavior-through-digital-cohort-approach.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Understanding-vaping-behavior-through-digital-cohort-approach.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6816508-a298-41a2-b4f6-f011aecd3635 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 13:00:26 -0400 Understanding vaping behavior through digital cohort approach
健康饮食可降低跨基因谱的 2 型糖尿病风险东芬兰大学的一项新研究表明，遵循营养建议的健康饮食与更好的血糖水平以及较低的前驱糖尿病和 2 型糖尿病风险相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Healthy-diet-mitigates-type-2-diabetes-risk-across-genic-profiles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Healthy-diet-mitigates-type-2-diabetes-risk-across-genic-profiles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cabdebd-3f9a-4017-a36f-f136100a1049 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 12:31:54 -0400 Healthy diet mitigates type 2 diabetes risk across genetic profiles
利用翻译后修饰开发结核病加强疫苗结核病仍然是最致命的传染病之一，每年在全球造成超过一百万人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Harnessing-post-translational-modifications-for-a-tuberculosis-booster-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Harnessing-post-translational-modifications-for-a-tuberculosis-booster-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6bde2f3-726e-49b3-bab8-0bdf6d7b336e Wed, 19 Jun 2024 12:26:23 -0400 Harnessing post-translational modifications for a tuberculosis booster vaccine
离子电子技术有望减缓恶性脑肿瘤的生长当使用所谓的离子电子技术在恶性脑肿瘤附近持续施用低剂量的抗癌药物时，癌细胞的生长会急剧减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Iontronic-technology-shows-promise-in-slowing-malignant-brain-tumor-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Iontronic-technology-shows-promise-in-slowing-malignant-brain-tumor-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71a130ab-342e-481b-b61d-f48a925a7c89 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 12:19:51 -0400 Iontronic technology shows promise in slowing malignant brain tumor growth
研究表明时间细胞在复杂行为学习中的关键作用时间感是我们理解、回忆和与世界互动的基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Study-shows-the-ritic-role-of-time-cells-in-complex-behavioral-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Study-shows-the-ritic-role-of-time-cells-in-complex-behavioral-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17fd79a6-79bc-41ab-a2e4-366a953061c7 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 11:30:17 -0400 Study shows the critical role of time cells in complex behavioral learning
